      java.util.List<Route> getRoutesWithoutConnectingAirport()
      Retrieves all the routes from Ryanair and filter them to get the ones without connecting airport.

    • Method Detail

      • getRoutesWithoutConnectingAirport

        @Cacheable(value="Route")
public java.util.List<Route> getRoutesWithoutConnectingAirport()
        Retrieves all the routes from Ryanair and filter them to get the ones without connecting airport. The result is cached to improve efficiency.
        Returns:
        a list of routes with no connecting airports

      • createListOfListsFromGraph

        public java.util.List<java.util.List<Route>> createListOfListsFromGraph(java.util.List<org.jgrapht.GraphPath<java.lang.String,com.acacho.ryanair.services.RouteEdge>> listPaths)
        Parameters:
        listPaths - a list containing all the GraphPaths
        Returns:
        a list of lists, each of them containing the list of available routes from origin to destination

      • createListFromGraph

      • createGraph

        public org.jgrapht.Graph<java.lang.String,com.acacho.ryanair.services.RouteEdge> createGraph(java.util.List<Route> routes)
        Parameters:
        routes - a list of routes
        Returns:
        a DefaultDirectedGraph with RouteEdge edges in which each vertex is an IATA airport code and every edge an available route between them.

      • computePaths
